titleStmt.title: The merchants daughter of Bristow The tune is, the maidens joy.
Marchants daughter of Bristow.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: The marchants daughter of Bristow.
Verse - "Behold the touch-stone of true loue,".

Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
